attributes.title: What We Build Consciously Becomes Our Life!
attributes.description:
7 AUGUST 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*LIFE IS ALL ABOUT THE CONSCIOUSNESS WE BUILT, WE ARE BUILDING AND WE ARE GOING TO BE BUILDING.

*WHATEVER CONSCIOUSNESS YOU BUILT LAST FEW YEARS YOU ARE ENJOYING NOW.

*WHATEVER CONSCIOUSNESS YOU ARE BUILDING NOW YOU ARE GOING TO ENJOY THE RESULT OF IT IN NEXT FEW YEARS.

*YOUR THOUGHT CURRENTS, THE THOUGHT CURRENT WHICH YOU ENCOURAGED BY CHERISHING THEM AND THOSE YOU MADE INTO REALITY BY ACTION OR INACTION

*FOR EXAMPLE: YOU WANT TO DO PUJA.

*IF YOU DO THE ACTION CALLED PUJA, THAT THOUGHT CURRENT BECOMES POWERFUL.

*IF YOU WANT TO BE IN DEPRESSION, IF YOU DON'T DO ANYTHING, IT BECOMES REALITY.

*ALL THESE THINGS PUT TOGETHER IS WHAT I CALL CONSCIOUSNESS - WHAT YOU ENGAGE, ENTRAIN, AND ENTERTAIN.

*WHEN YOU ARE IN YOUR 20’S IF YOU DO YOGA, YOU WILL BE HEALTHY IN YOUR 30’S.

*IF YOU DO YOGA IN YOUR 30’S, YOU WILL ENJOY THE RESULTS IN YOUR 40’S. IT IS ALL ABOUT THE BODY YOU BUILT THAT YOU ARE GOING TO ENJOY. SAME WAY WITH CONSCIOUSNESS ALSO.

*A NORMAL HUMAN BEING TAKES 6 MONTHS TO BUILD A NEW CONSCIOUSNESS. THAT IS WHY I SAY, ANYONE WHO IS ATTENDING SATSANGS FOR LAST 6 MONTHS IS ABSOLUTELY IN THE RIGHT TRACK TOWARDS ENLIGHTENMENT. YOU ARE ON YOUR FLIGHT TO KAILASA BECAUSE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS YOU CAN'T CHEAT! EVEN IF YOU ARE AN ATHEIST DRAVISH MAFIA MONSTER OR ANTI-HINDU ELEMENT WHO HAS COME FOR SPYING, IF YOU START ATTENDING SATSANG THINKING, “IF I WATCH SATSANG, SOMEWHERE HE MIGHT BLURT OUT WHERE KAILASA IS, LET ME WATCH THE SATSANG,” YOU WILL SIMPLY BE MY DISCIPLE! 6 MONTHS IT TOO MUCH TIME! MANY PEOPLE WHO CAME TO SPY ME STARTED ENJOYING THE SPICE AND BECAME MY DEVOTEE!

*THE CONSCIOUSNESS YOU BUILT IS LIFE. I AM ABSOLUTE INTEGRITY AND COMPASSION. I DON'T KNOW ANY OF THE SOCIETY’S CUNNING STRATEGIC METHODOLOGIES; NEITHER EXPLOITATIVE ECONOMIC POLICIES NOR CHRONIC CAPITALISTIC METHODOLOGIES OR THE SHREWD POLITICS.

*I HAVE STARTED DOING WHAT I AM DOING NOW THE MOMENT I IDENTIFIED MYSELF AND MY GURUS WHAT THEY HAVE TO OFFER TO ME AND WHAT I AM SUPPOSED TO OFFER TO THE WORLD. IT IS A SIMPLE “GURU-SHISHYA PARAMPARA GONE RIGHT!” YOU HAVE HEARD ONLY THE MANY THINGS THAT HAVE GONE WRONG TILL NOW.

*”NITHYANANDA AND KAILASA IS NOTHING BUT A LIVING SMALL STREAM OF LIVING ENLIGHTENED MASTERS GURU-SHISHYA PARAMPARA GONE RIGHT” THAT'S ALL! THIS IS THE ONE LINER DEFINITION!

*WHEN YOU ARE LOCKING YOURSELF WHOLE DAY IN FRONT OF THE ZOOM ROOM, LAUGHING AND SINGING ON YOUR OWN, YOUR SPOUSE OR FAMILY MAY ASK, “TELL ME IN ONE LINE WHAT NITHYANANDA AND KAILASA IS ALL ABOUT.”

*IN A SMALL VILLAGE IN THOSE DAYS, EXISTED A SMALL LIVING STREAM OF ENLIGHTENED MASTERS. THAT GURU -SHISHYA PARAMPARA GONE RIGHT IN THE MODERN WORLD IS NITHYANANDA AND KAILASA. THAT'S IT!

*YOU MIGHT HAVE HEARD: “ANYTHING CAN GO WRONG CAN GO WRONG.” I TELL YOU: “ANYTHING THAT CAN GO RIGHT CAN GO RIGHT!”

*ALL I KNOW IS ABSOLUTE INTEGRITY TO MY GURUS; PURE VISION, SINCERE HARD WORK WITHOUT ANY EXPLOITATIVE STRATEGIES.

*I AM DOING WHAT I AM DOING EVEN WHEN I DID NOT HAVE ANYTHING SUPPORTING ME. WE HAVE THE EARLIEST VIDEO RECORDS OF ME AVAILABLE - 2001-2002. EVEN AT THAT TIME YOU CAN SEE I AM DESCRIBING THAT I AM NOT AT ALL BOTHERED ABOUT SUCCESS. I AM CLEARLY READY FOR SIMPLE HARD WORK TO HELP EVERY HUMAN BEING, EVERY INDIVIDUAL.

*I WAS VERY CLEAR WHEN I STARTED MY PUBLIC LIFE, WHEN I STARTED ENRICHING THE WORLD, I DID NOT HAVE WEALTH OR SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE. I ONLY RECEIVED ENLIGHTENMENT AND THE GUIDANCE FROM MY GURUS. I DID NOT HAVE ANY EXTERNAL SUPPORT. BUT I WAS VERY CLEAR I CAN PEEL MY SKIN AND MAKE CHAPPAL FOR MY GURUS. IF I DO NOT HAVE ANYTHING, I CAN PEEL MY SKIN AND MAKE GURU PADUKAS. THAT CLEAR DEDICATION I HAD.

*WITH THAT DEDICATION I DECIDED, I WILL DO WHATEVER I CAN WITH ALL MY INTEGRITY TO MAKE THIS KAILASA HAPPEN.

*LITERALLY MY GURUS BIRTHED ME, BROUGHT ME FROM KAILASA, PROTECTED AND GROOMED ME, MADE ME MANIFEST. HOW I AM DOING FOR SKANDMATA, EXACTLY THE SAME WAY MY GURUS HAVE DONE FOR ME. I PERSONALLY WENT AND BIRTHED SKANDAMATA, BROUGHT SKANDAMATA TO PLANET EARTH!


Read More At: www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4198527000235118
